attributes.action: ensure local authorities provide a weekly rubbish collection service for the sake of public health.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Weekly collections were not introduced to provide a nice public service out of the goodness of public minded capitalists hearts. They were introduced to protect themselves,and and as a side product,the general public from vermin and diseases.Please sack the person who suggested this cost saving exercise and keep the government's eye on the ball.
